        private readonly bool _isInitialized;

        public NoJsonShortVo()

#if DEBUG

#endif

            _isInitialized = false;
            _value = default;

        private NoJsonShortVo(short value) 
        {
            _value = value;
            _isInitialized = true;
        }

        public static NoJsonShortVo From(short value)
        {
            NoJsonShortVo instance = new NoJsonShortVo(value);

        public readonly bool Equals(NoJsonShortVo other)
        {
            // It's possible to create uninitialized instances via converters such as EfCore (HasDefaultValue), which call Equals.
            // We treat anything uninitialized as not equal to anything, even other uninitialized instances of this type.
            if(!_isInitialized || !other._isInitialized) return false;

            return System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer<short>.Default.Equals(Value, other.Value);
        }

        public readonly bool Equals(short primitive) => Value.Equals(primitive);

        public readonly override bool Equals(object obj)
        {
            return obj is NoJsonShortVo && Equals((NoJsonShortVo) obj);
        }

        public static bool operator ==(NoJsonShortVo left, NoJsonShortVo right) => Equals(left, right);
        public static bool operator !=(NoJsonShortVo left, NoJsonShortVo right) => !(left == right);

        public static bool operator ==(NoJsonShortVo left, short right) => Equals(left.Value, right);
        public static bool operator !=(NoJsonShortVo left, short right) => !Equals(left.Value, right);

        public static bool operator ==(short left, NoJsonShortVo right) => Equals(left, right.Value);
        public static bool operator !=(short left, NoJsonShortVo right) => !Equals(left, right.Value);

        public readonly override int GetHashCode() => System.Collections.Generic.EqualityComparer<short>.Default.GetHashCode(_value);

        public readonly override string ToString() => Value.ToString();

        private readonly void EnsureInitialized()
        {
            if (!_isInitialized)
            {
#if DEBUG
                string message = "Use of uninitialized Value Object at: " + _stackTrace ?? "";
#else
                string message = "Use of uninitialized Value Object.";
#endif

                throw new ValueObjectValidationException(message);
            }
        }

        
 
        


        class NoJsonShortVoTypeConverter : System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
        {
            public override bool CanConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Type sourceType)
            {
                return sourceType == typeof(short) || sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertFrom(context, sourceType);
            }

            public override object ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value)
            {
                return value switch
                {
                    short shortValue => new NoJsonShortVo(shortValue),
                    int intValue => new NoJsonShortVo((short)intValue),
                    long longValue => new NoJsonShortVo((short)longValue),
                    string stringValue when  !string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringValue) && short.TryParse(stringValue, out var result) => new NoJsonShortVo(result),
                    _ => base.ConvertFrom(context, culture, value),
                };
            }

            public override bool CanConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Type sourceType)
            {
                return sourceType == typeof(short) || sourceType == typeof(string) || base.CanConvertTo(context, sourceType);
            }

            public override object ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, System.Type destinationType)
            {
                if (value is NoJsonShortVo idValue)
                {
                    if (destinationType == typeof(short))
                    {
                        return idValue.Value;
                    }

                    if (destinationType == typeof(string))
                    {
                        return idValue.Value.ToString();
                    }
                }

                return base.ConvertTo(context, culture, value, destinationType);
            }
